sense.def:
Kadar neka organizacija
sponsors an event or someone's training
, plača del ali vse stroške, povezane z nekim dogodkom ali urjenjem.

seg.quote: The conference was sponsored by the Guardian.

sense.def:
To sponsor someone
pomeni strinjati se, da nekomu, ki nekaj počne za to, da bi zbral denar v dobrodelne namene, damo določen znesek v ta namen, če se mu posreči tisto narediti.

seg.quote: Would you mind sponsoring me in this swim for cancer research?

sense.def:
To sponsor a proposal
pomeni uradno dati neki predlog in ga zagovarjati.

seg.quote: Two Liberal MPs sponsored the Bill.

sense.def:
A sponsor
je oseba ali organizacija, ki denarno podpira nekoga ali nekaj.
